column5: how should i troll on small lakes for bas,pike,walleye..not any of the complicated stuff...i usually fish on bellwood lake,conestogo, guelph, mountsberg,..ect
Not to be a smart  simply tie on a lure of your choice, let out 10  - 200 feet of line and drive your boat at a slow speed.
try a variety of speeds and depths.  do some zig zags. when you catch a fish repeat what you were doing.
